byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Ashley Parker from Washington.

abstract: Involvement of American political operative Jeremy Bird in upcoming Israeli elections has drawn attention due to tensions between two countries; Bird was architect of online and grass-roots organizing efforts for Pres Obama's presidential campaign, and critics of Obama say Bird's work to oust Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu is indication that Obama himself is playing politics with Netanyahu's decision to address joint session of Congress about Iran.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Bird, a former Obama campaign organizer, has drawn fire from Republicans for his consulting work on an effort to unseat Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

headline.main: Former Obama Campaign Aide Now Works to Oust Netanyahu
headline.print_headline: Former Obama Campaign Aide Now Works to Oust Netanyahu

snippet: Jeremy Bird, a former Obama campaign organizer, has drawn fire from Republicans for his consulting work on an effort to unseat Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
